reviewText: One of the best guitar players alive.
Are you serious? Chris Rea is great. This DVD package is a keeper. A music lovers must have. Buy it.

This is Chris Rea's Best CD ever!! I love the live recordings and the way you can feel how much Chris puts into his music. I wish the US radio stations would have played more of his music in the past, alot of people are missing a GREAT artist!!! Clifford Sleeth Houston Texas.
